import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function Encode() { const [inputMessage, setMessage] = useState(""); const [rotorOne, setRotorOne] = useState('I'); const [rotorTwo, setRotorTwo] = useState('I'); const [rotorThree, setRotorThree] = useState('I'); const [initPosOne, setInitPosingOne] = useState('A') const [initPosTwo, setInitPosingTwo] = useState('A') const [initPosThree, setInitPosingThree] = useState('A') const [ringOne, setRingOne] = useState('A') const [ringTwo, setRingTwo] = useState('A') const [ringThree, setRingThree] = useState('A') const [reflector, setReflector] = useState('UKW-C'); useEffect(() => { isValidInput(inputMessage); console.log("Input messge: ", inputMessage); // console.log("rotor1: ", rotorOne) // console.log("rotor2: ", rotorTwo) // console.log("rotor3: ", rotorThree) // console.log("initPosOne: ", initPosOne) // console.log("initPosOne: ", initPosTwo) // console.log("initPosTwo: ", initPosThree) // console.log("ringSetting one: ", ringOne) // console.log("ringSetting Two: ", ringTwo) // console.log("ringSetting Three: ", ringThree) // console.log("settings side: ", reflector) }, [inputMessage, rotorOne, rotorTwo, rotorThree, initPosOne, initPosTwo, initPosThree, ringOne, ringTwo, ringThree, reflector]) //eslint-disable-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps function isValidInput(inputMessage) { inputMessage = inputMessage.replace(/\s/g, ''); if (/^[a-zA-Z]*$/g.test(inputMessage)){ //console.log("its a valid input"); } else{ //console.log("error bad input") alert("Please use only the letters A-Z either upper or lower case.") } } // Note used Rotors from Enigma 1 Introduced in 1930. Rotors IV and V were introduced for the M3 Army Enigma in 1938 (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enigma_rotor_details) var defaultAlfa = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ".split(''); var Alt = "BCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZA".split(''); var Alt2 = "CDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZAB".split(''); var I = "EKMFLGDQVZNTOWYHXUSPAIBRCJ".split(''); var II = "AJDKSIRUXBLHWTMCQGZNPYFVOE".split(''); var III = "BDFHJLCPRTXVZNYEIWGAKMUSQO".split(''); var IV = "ESOVPZJAYQUIRHXLNFTGKDCMWB".split(''); var V = "VZBRGITYUPSDNHLXAWMJQOFECK".split(''); var rotorOneCount = 1 var rotorTwoCount = 1 function turnRotor(rotor) { var temp = rotor[0]; rotor.shift(); rotor.push(temp); rotorOneCount += 1; // console.log("r1count: ", rotorOneCount, " r2count: ", rotorTwoCount) // console.log(I) if(rotorOneCount > 25){ rotorOneCount = 0 turnRotorTwo(I) ////////////////////////// need to switch I for active rotor variable } } function turnRotorTwo(rotor){ var temp = rotor[0]; rotor.shift(); rotor.push(temp); rotorTwoCount += 1 if(rotorTwoCount > 25){ rotorTwoCount = 0 turnRotorThree(II) ///////////////////////////need to switch II for active rotor variable } } function turnRotorThree(rotor){ var temp = rotor[0]; rotor.shift(); rotor.push(temp); } function encrypt(){ var input = inputMessage.toUpperCase() var output = "" for(let i = 0; i < input.length; i++){ var count = 0 var j = 0 while(defaultAlfa[j] !== input[i]){ //// defaultAlfa needs to change toi input variable count += 1 j += 1 console.log("defaultAlfa[j] ", defaultAlfa[j], " input[i] ", input[i] ) //// defaultAlfa needs to change toi input variable console.log("count ", count) } output += Alt[count] /// alt needs to change to input variable console.log("encrypt output: ", output) turnRotor(Alt) /// alt needs to change to input variable } } encrypt(); return (
setMessage(event.target.value)} />

) } export default Encode
